author: cnbc.com
title: INGENICO GROUP: Q1 2018 Revenue Conference Call Invitation
text:
Q1 2018 Revenue
Conference Call
Philippe Lazare
Chairman and CEO
is pleased to invite you to our first quarter revenue conference call on
Wednesday, April 25 at 6pm (CET)
Please dial the following numbers to join the call:
France Toll: +33 1 72 72 74 03
UK Toll: +44 20 7194 3759
USA Toll: +1 646 722 4916
Conference pin: 86931991#
A press release and a presentation will be available on www.ingenico.com prior to the call at (5:40pm).
About Ingenico Group
Ingenico Group (Euronext: FR0000125346 - ING) is the global leader in seamless payment, providing smart, trusted and secure solutions to empower commerce across all channels, in-store, online and mobile. With the world's largest payment acceptance network, we deliver secure payment solutions with a local, national and international scope. We are the trusted world-class partner for financial institutions and retailers, from small merchants to several of the world's best known global brands. Our solutions enable merchants to simplify payment and deliver their brand promise.
Stay in touch with us:
www.ingenico.com twitter.com/ingenico
